players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Diana was the first one to be killed. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."

Charlie: "I agree with Bob, we need to be vigilant and make sure we vote wisely. Let's not jump to conclusions based on the first death. We still have a lot of information to gather before making any decisions."

Bob: "Let's not forget that we are all in this together and our main goal is to identify the mafioso among us. We should focus on gathering more information before making any hasty decisions. I believe that trust and communication will be key in helping us solve this mystery."

Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
